name: Shoot the Works
description:
In Shoot the Works you play as Die Guy, A guy with the power of being a die! Jump, Shoot, and Roll your way to the exit to complete each level.

Controls:
A and D: Run
W or Space: Jump
Shift or Right Click: Roll
Left Click: Shoot

This game was made solo in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

all assets were made during the jam with the exception of one font;

https://www.1001fonts.com/arcadeclassic-font.html
